quotes.quote: The first recorded mention of a settlement at Belize was in 1638, when a few mariners and adventurers formed the nucleus of what has become entirely a wood-cutting and trading community. At first a settlement, then a superintendency, later a dependency of Jamaica, in I884 a full Crown colony was established, and Belize is its capital.
